name: 黃啟梧
objective: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
schedule:
1. introduction
2. what is interaction design
3. understanging and conceptualizing interaction
4. understanging users
5. designing for collaboration and communication
6. understanding how interfaces affect users
7. the process of interaction design
8. identify needs and establishing requirements
9. design, prototyping and construction
10. user-centered approaches to interaction design
11. introducing evaluation
12. an evaluation framework
13. observing users
14. asking users and experts
15. testing and modeling users
16. design and evaluation in the real world: communicatiors and advisory systems
17. happy new year
18. examination
materials: Preece, Rogers and Sharp, 2002, Interaction Design: beyond human-computer interaction, John Wiley and Sons, Inc.
